Hi, I'm Aevan Josh.

I am an application developer with a passion for developing web applications using cutting edge web technologies.

Projects

Cinehives

  • Work in Progress
  • NextJS
  • Postgres
  • Vercel
  • Supabase
  • Prisma ORM

Cinehives is a community-based film and TV show review and logging web application. Users can sign up to log, rate, review their favourite movies and TV shows or simply just browse trending ones for their next watch. Utilising the MovieDB API.

PLAYLISTED

  • Personal
  • React
  • APIs
  • NodeJS
  • Vercel

PLAYLISTED is a Spotify playlist generator that allows users to create varied playlist based on Spotify artists and imports the playlist directly to their Spotify. Utilising the Spotify Web API.

Weather App

  • Personal
  • React
  • JavaScript
  • APIs
  • HTML

A simple React weather application personal project that lets users search and view current and weekly forecast of cities around the world utilising third party APIs.

Car Sharing Web Application

  • University
  • React
  • JavaScript
  • NoSQL
  • APIs

My capstone project for university. A responsive web application for a fictitious car-sharing service called "Car Pirates", where users can choose to pick up cars within the area and drop them off anywhere after usage.

About Me

More About Myself

Hi, I'm Aevan, a full-stack application developer passionate about crafting responsive, cutting edge, scalable, and user-friendly web experiences. I thrive on solving complex problems and building intuitive applications that enhance user engagement.

My journey in web development started at a young age, when I was experimenting with HTML and CSS files trying to create local websites. I enjoyed it so much that I even submitted some of my high-school presentations as websites. As my passion grew, I expanded my skills from vanilla JavaScript to modern frameworks like React, leading to my first professional role as a Graduate Web Developer, where I built staple features for big eCommerce brands using Vue.js.

Currently, as an Application Developer at the Australian Taxation Office, I design and implement automation solutions for key business operations. My work spans Access applications, Excel macros, and SharePoint-hosted web applications, where I've led projects integrating SharePoint as a backend with AngularJS for front-end solutions, delivering high-impact tools for internal stakeholders.

I'm eager to bring my expertise in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and full-stack development to a team where I can contribute to building scalable and innovative web applications. I'm particularly drawn to roles where I can collaborate on cutting-edge projects, optimize performance, and enhance user experience through well-structured, maintainable code.
